item.title: Welcome to CI Wise
item.author: David L. Whitehurst
item.description:
Welcome to CI Wise. We're dedicated to being a company that's focused on helping Enterprise be world-class. Are you wise to continuous improvement? Every successful business is on a quest to be better. Our job is to help you get there. Your dreams can be our designs. Tell us more, we're here to help.

This post is unfinished and the publish date will be revised with every site update. This keeps our welcome page at the top of our posts.
